originalText.text: One of the few doctors that let's you text him on his personal phone and is literally available 24/7. Both my children are very active and on occasion have gotten injuries. He's the first person we call. He's great with kids, both my kids have had stitches on their chins, I had a lip injury and literally after the right care there's little to no scaring.

originalText.text: Dr. Mir is excellent, he speaks honestly and is one of the most humble human beings. Extremely meticulous and highly skilled. Can't praise him enough. Like others have said, he is stern and your well being is the most important to him. Need more people like him in the world. Highly recommend this Surgeon! Office staff is really nice and professional as well.

text.text: Dr. Mir is excellent, he speaks honestly and is one of the most humble human beings. Extremely meticulous and highly skilled. Can't praise him enough. Like others have said, he is stern and your well being is the most important to him. Need more people like him in the world. Highly recommend this Surgeon! Office staff is really nice and professional as well.

originalText.text: Dr. Mir is the best of the BEST from his staff (Alex) to his expertise I couldn’t have picked a better doctor. He is all about your well being. He cares so much about his patients that’s his number one concern. He explained everything in detail from the beginning of my surgery  to when he discharged me. He’s AMAZING in what he does. God bless my doctors hands!!! If you are looking for the best... Dr. Mir is the one you need!

originalText.text: Dr. Mir is an excellent plastic surgeon. I met Dr. Mir after returning to the operating room with complications from a knee replacement operation. He is a skilled surgeon, has a superb sense of urgency and is thorough in his evaluations. Dr. Mir is also kind and personable. I highly recommend Dr. Mir; I continue to see him for other services unrelated to my original condition.

text.text: Dr. Mir is an excellent plastic surgeon. I met Dr. Mir after returning to the operating room with complications from a knee replacement operation. He is a skilled surgeon, has a superb sense of urgency and is thorough in his evaluations. Dr. Mir is also kind and personable. I highly recommend Dr. Mir; I continue to see him for other services unrelated to my original condition.

originalText.text: Met Dr Mir. when he was the plastic surgeon called into the emergency room after I had a hand accident.  He was very kind and explained all that was happening.  Everything healed well and since then, everyone in my family has gone to him for various issues.  He is not only talented but also takes him time and never rushes through an appointment.  You never feel like he is thinking about another patient or appointment while he is talking to you.  He truly goes out of his way to help and never acts like he's doing you a favor -- is very humble and doesn't even seem to want a "thank you."  His staff, especially Alex, go out of their way to help you with appointments and information.  We are repeat patients and would highly recommend to anyone.

Everything healed well and since then, everyone in my family has gone to him for various issues.  He is not only talented but also takes him time and never rushes through an appointment.  You never feel like he is thinking about another patient or appointment while he is talking to you.  He truly goes out of his way to help and never acts like he's doing you a favor -- is very humble and doesn't even seem to want a "thank you."  His staff, especially Alex, go out of their way to help you with appointments and information.  We are repeat patients and would highly recommend to anyone.
